Package model

Class UserPlayer

java.lang.Object
model.UserPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputerPlayer
public class UserPlayer extends Object implements Player
This class represents a human player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game and implements the Player interface. A player has a symbol and a score, and it provides methods for getting the symbol and score, increasing the score, and making a move on the board.

    • makeMove

      public GameState makeMove(int row, int col, Board board)
      Make a move on the board on the specified tile on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the tile to make a move on
      col - the column of the tile to make a move
      board - the board to make the move on
      Returns:
      The state of the game after the move, return INVALID_MOVE if the move is not valid.
